setStorageDefault().Description: Sets the storage location used internally by this class to be the default provided by the hosting @B_android#content#Context_E@.

Returns: The @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ with the key, or null.
Parameters: CharSequence: The key of the preference to retrieve.
findPreference(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Finds a @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ based on its key.

setStorageDeviceProtected().Description: Explicitly set the storage location used internally by this class to be device-protected storage. On devices with direct boot, data stored in this location is encrypted with a key tied to the physical device, and it can be accessed immediately after the device has booted successfully, both before and after the user has authenticated with their credentials (such as a lock pattern or PIN). Because device-protected data is available without user authentication, you should carefully limit the data you store using this Context. For example, storing sensitive authentication tokens or passwords in the device-protected area is strongly discouraged. Prior to API 24 this method has no effect, since device-protected storage is not available.

Returns: a @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@ instance pointing to the file that contain the values of preferences that are managed by this PreferenceManager. If a @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceDataStore_E@ has been set, this method returns null.
getSharedPreferences().Description: Gets a @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@ instance that preferences managed by this will use.

Returns: The @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceDataStore_E@ associated with this manager or null if none.
getPreferenceDataStore().Description: Returns the @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceDataStore_E@ associated with this manager or null if the default @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@ are used instead.

isStorageDefault().Description: Indicates if the storage location used internally by this class is the default provided by the hosting @B_android#content#Context_E@.

Parameters: int: The mode of the SharedPreferences file.
setSharedPreferencesMode(int).Description: Sets the mode of the SharedPreferences file that preferences managed by this will use.

Returns: The mode that can be passed to @B_android#content#Context#getSharedPreferences_E@.
getSharedPreferencesMode().Description: Returns the current mode of the SharedPreferences file that preferences managed by this will use.

Returns: The name that can be passed to @B_android#content#Context#getSharedPreferences_E@.
getSharedPreferencesName().Description: Returns the current name of the @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@ file that preferences managed by this will use.

Returns: The @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceScreen_E@ object that is at the root of the hierarchy.
getPreferenceScreen().Description: Returns the root of the preference hierarchy managed by this class.

getOnNavigateToScreenListener().Description: Returns the @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceManager#OnNavigateToScreenListener_E@, if one has been set.

isStorageDeviceProtected().Description: Indicates if the storage location used internally by this class is backed by device-protected storage.

Parameters: String: The name of the SharedPreferences file.
setSharedPreferencesName(java.lang.Strin.Description: Sets the name of the @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@ file that preferences managed by this will use. If custom @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceDataStore_E@ is set, this won't override its usage.

ClassDesc: Used to help create @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ hierarchies from activities or XML. In most cases, clients should use @B_android#support#v14#preference#PreferenceFragment#addPreferencesFromResource_E@, or @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceFragmentCompat#addPreferencesFromResource_E@.
